name: Melpaca

aura.name: pacapaca_wool
aura.description:
Can be ridden.
Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

description: Don't be fooled by its fluffy appearance. A hypersonic kick from one of its long legs may send you flying to the other side of the world.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: fluffy_tackle
skills.description: Melpaca's exclusive skill. Charges forward while clad in an aura of sublime adorableness.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
